import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {FormGroup} from "@angular/forms"; import {TodoServiceService} from "../../services/todo-service.service"; import {ActivatedRoute} from "@angular/router"; import {ItodoItem} from "../../models/itodo-item"; import {Location} from "@angular/common"; @Component({ selector: 'app-edit-todo-item', templateUrl: './edit-todo-item.component.html', styleUrls: ['./edit-todo-item.component.scss'] }) export class EditTodoItemComponent implements OnInit { todoForm: FormGroup; paramId: string | null | undefined constructor(private todoService: TodoServiceService, private route: ActivatedRoute, private location: Location) { this.todoForm = this.todoService.getTodoForm(); } ngOnInit() { this.paramId = this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('id'); if (this.paramId) this.getItemDetails(this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('id')); } private getItemDetails(id: string | null) { if (id) this.todoService.getDetails(id).subscribe((item: ItodoItem) => { this.todoForm = this.todoService.populateForm(item); }) } onSubmitForm() { if (this.paramId) this.updateItem() else { this.createTodoItem() } } createTodoItem() { this.todoService.createItem(this.todoForm.value).subscribe((item: ItodoItem) => { this.location.back(); }) } private updateItem() { this.todoService.updateItem(this.todoForm.value).subscribe((item: ItodoItem) => { this.location.back(); }) } isValid() { return !this.todoForm.valid } }
